ai-tha-ap361:1.1_0: “Open the boat which washed by the ship,
ai-tha-ap361:1.3_0: or being because of their foe.
ai-tha-ap361:2.2_0: I have gone for refuge to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap361:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap361:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmajī.
ai-tha-ap361:5.1_0: S remembering the opposite of the Elder Nuns,
